snippet: Two deals settle criminal and civil accusations that two of an Alcoa joint venture’s subsidiaries bribed officials for years so they could supply raw materials to Aluminium Bahrain.
lead_paragraph: Two deals settle criminal and civil accusations that two of an Alcoa joint venture’s subsidiaries bribed officials for years so they could supply raw materials to Aluminium Bahrain.

headline.main: Alcoa to Pay $384 Million to Settle Bribery Charges
headline.print_headline: Alcoa to Pay $384 Million to Settle Bribery Charges
